Frequently Asked Questions:
**Q: How do I create a tournament?** A: Go to "Add Tournament" in the main menu, provide the required details, and customize the tournament settings.
**Q: Can I change my account information?** A: Yes, you can update your name, email, and other details in the "Account Settings" section.
**Q: How do I report inappropriate behavior?** A: Tap on the user\'s profile, select "Report," and provide details about the issue.
**Q: Can I delete a tournament I\'ve created?** A: Yes, navigate to your tournament, select "Manage," and choose the delete option.
**Q: How do notifications work?** A: Notifications can be enabled or disabled for specific activities in the "Notification Settings" section.
**Q: Is my data secure?** A: Absolutely. Your data is encrypted and stored securely in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
For additional questions, reach out to us at tourniverse@gmail.com.

Need assistance? Contact our support team: Email: tourniverse@gmail.com Response Time: Within 24-48 hours (excluding weekends and holidays).
